description.basic: Create a freestyle application, starting with an empty page.
description.fpm: Create an SAP Fiori elements application containing a custom page based on the flexible programming model.
description.lrop: Create an SAP Fiori elements application containing a list report and an object page.
description.worklist: Create an SAP Fiori elements application containing a worklist and an object page.
description.alp: Create an SAP Fiori elements application containing an analytical list and an object page.
description.ovp: Create an SAP Fiori elements application containing an overview page.
description.feop: Create an SAP Fiori elements application containing an object page optimized for data entry.

sapSystemType.abapOnBtp: ABAP Environment on SAP Business Technology Platform

texts.runInstruction:
In order to launch the generated app, simply run the following from the generated app root folder:

```
    npm start
```

datasourceAndServiceSelection.description: Configure the data source and select a service.
datasourceAndServiceSelection.title: Data Source and Service Selection

logMessages.installingDependencies: Installing dependencies to package path: {{- path}}...
logMessages.errorInstallingDependencies: Unknown error while installing project dependencies.
logMessages.applicationGenerationSuccess: Application generated successfully, available at {{- targetFolder}}
logMessages.attemptingToExecutePostGenerationCommand: Attempting to execute command after app generation: {{- command}}
logMessages.installSkippedOptionSpecified: Option `--skipInstall` was specified. Installation of dependencies will be skipped.
logMessages.generatorExiting: Application generation exiting due to error: {{error}}

error.fatalError: An error has occurred, please restart the generator
error.errorWritingApplicationFiles: An error occurred writing application files
error.appConfigVersion: Application config version must match a supported version: {{versions}}
error.appConfigUnparseableEdmx: Application config property edmx cannot be parsed
error.appConfigMissingRequiredProperty: Application config is missing a required property: {{propertyName}}
error.edmxNotFound: Edmx (metadata) is required to continue with generation. Application generation exiting.
error.invalidYUIStepConfig: Invalid Yeoman UI step config: First step cannot have dependency property

validationMessages.viewNameRequired: You must provide a view name in order to continue.
validationMessages.viewNameTooLong: View name cannot contain more than 120 characters
validationMessages.viewNameInvalid: The view name must start with a letter and may contain letters, digits, dashes, and underscores.
